title.rendered: Alutech Aluminium Transfer in March 2005 Confirmed

content.rendered: As previously reported, the factory structure has been completed and is ready for occupation by the 1st of February 2005. The record build time allows Alutech Aluminium to shift its production and assembly equipment for aluminium and cladding within the next weeks. Aluminium management, project managers and design department are scheduled to move into the new premises by the end of March.
